metadata.name: Character Prompts Example
metadata.description: キャラクター別プロンプト設定例
metadata.author: NovelAI Auto Generator

anime-girl.name: アニメ少女
anime-girl.description: アニメスタイルの少女キャラクター

prompts.positive: 1girl, anime style, beautiful face, long hair, school uniform, {best quality}, {masterpiece}
prompts.negative: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, cropped, worst quality, low quality

realistic-portrait.name: リアル系ポートレート
realistic-portrait.description: リアルな人物ポートレート

prompts.positive: portrait, realistic, professional photography, detailed face, natural lighting, {best quality}, {masterpiece}
prompts.negative: anime, cartoon, lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, cropped, worst quality, low quality

prompts.negative: medieval, fantasy, lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, cropped, worst quality, low quality
